question: How can I explain to a non-muslim why a Muslim women must cover her hair?
answer:
QUESTION
I actually want this person to understand the logic of Islam and at the same time become more and more curious towards Islam. I also want this person to understand the status that Islam gives women because nowadays western beliefs has strayed the human mind into thinking that Islam restricts women too much. Please help me on this matter as I would like to draw people toward Islam rather than away. Shukran Wassalaam
